task.title: Generating an Authority-Signed Certificate
task.shortdesc: You can use the Java keytool command to request a certificate from a certifying authority.

step.cmd: From the command line, navigate to the following directory: <SDCinstalldir>/etc.
When keystore requests the keystore password, enter the password.
When keystore generates a new certificate request, send the request to the certifying authority.

To import the response to the sdc-keystore.jks file, use the following command and enter the keystore password when requested:
To verify the imported certificate, use the following command and enter the keystore password when requested:
Enter the keystore password in the keystore password file: <SDCinstalldir>/etc/sdc-keystore-password.txt.
Save a copy of the sdc-keystore.jks and sdc-keystore-password.txt files.
